ceMelusine presents:

TEMPLE

An Occult Mythic Adventure Game in the style of the acclaimed Kittyhorrorshow

Made for #CLONEJAMKITTY

features:

mountain biome

religious zealotry

a dead place

inner harmony

unlockable characters (wow what a truly real videogame)

a confession:

ol' Seems was out of town during the actual jam and therefore could not actually participate in the allotted time period. instead, he made this game a week in advance and in flagrant disregard of the work-hour limit. what an ass. sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry
